domain.repositories

Class GameSquareRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.repositories.GameSquareRepository

  • public class GameSquareRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the instances of all the GameSquare objects.
    Author:
    Thijs van der Burgt, Arno Schutijzer
